message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. I believe it's a great deal for you considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I can't go above $9,000 for this product. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, I understand your position.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find the product to be well worth it.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. However, I still can't go above $9,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
